results.raw_content:

Exhibitors
Shenzhen Etistar Control System Co., Ltd.
Shenzhen Etistar Control System Co., Ltd is one professional manufacturer for audio and video products.. Etistar has the certificates of ISO9001 and BSCI, and A member of HDMI and Bluetooth Licensing. Our worshop produce soundbar, bluetooth speaker, party speaker, Hi-fi speaker, speaker-projector combo, and projector. we have CE, FCC, CB, SAA, and TUV certificates for all our products.
With mission customer first, integrity-based, win-win, our experienced teams are always ready to listen to your requirements and ensure your satisfaction. Strict quality control is performed in every procedure from material sourcing, material incoming inspection, processing and testing to packing, to make sure that we can provide excellent products and services to our customers. Our products have been successfully exported to more than 60 countries and regions including Germany, Finland, Denmark, Russia, USA,Mexico, South America, South Africa and Asia. OEM/ODM are welcome.
